thread.title: Civil rights activist calls meeting with Hillary Clinton candid, but light on specifics
thread.title_full: Civil rights activist calls meeting with Hillary Clinton candid, but light on specifics - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Civil rights activist calls meeting with Hillary Clinton candid, but light on specifics
text: Prominent civil rights activists met with Democratic presidential frontrunner Hillary Clinton on Friday in Washington, D.C. to talk about her criminal justice policies before she releases a comprehensive set of prospective reforms,
